title: Damaged
description: Dax Pitchairn.Small town boy.Midwestern corn-fed muscle man.Former Marine....And my newest obsession.The thing about me, Sophie Roland is that I have nothing to lose.By day, I’m a bartender.At night, I’m lonely and vulnerable. I’ve been hurt before by men.First my father, a tough guy biker.Then my ex-boyfriend, a high rolling Wall Street executive, Damien.When Dax came along with his rippling muscles and sweet talk, I was nothing but tough. A steel cage surrounded my heart.And now we were locked in battle.But when the final count comes, who will be declared victorious? My heart or his?
author: Bane Hunter
